title: Bobby Hosts American Idol In Place Of Ryan Seacrest + Producer Eddie Shares Update On Foster Kids
itunes:title: Bobby Hosts American Idol In Place Of Ryan Seacrest + Producer Eddie Shares Update On Foster Kids
description:
Bobby was tapped to host last night’s episode of American Idol when Ryan Seacrest was too sick to make it. Producer Eddie shares an update on the two kids he’s been fostering. Also, Lunchbox opens up about a personal issue he has.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
